[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: New {
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    7,
                ),
                target: AnonymousClass(
                    AnonymousClass {
                        attributes: [],
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            11,
                        ),
                        extends: None,
                        implements: Some(
                            ClassImplements {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    17,
                                ),
                                interfaces: CommaSeparated {
                                    inner: [
                                        SimpleIdentifier {
                                            span: Span(
                                                1,
                                                28,
                                            ),
                                            value: "Foo",
                                        },
                                        SimpleIdentifier {
                                            span: Span(
                                                1,
                                                33,
                                            ),
                                            value: "Bar",
                                        },
                                    ],
                                    commas: [
                                        Span(
                                            1,
                                            31,
                                        ),
                                    ],
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                        body: ClassBody {
                            start: Span(
                                1,
                                37,
                            ),
                            end: Span(
                                1,
                                38,
                            ),
                            members: [],
                        },
                    },
                ),
                arguments: None,
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                39,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
